tool_description: Looks up a word in a spanish collocation database and returns the top spanish collocations + example sentences.
title: Linguatools Top Spanish Collocations

api_list.name: search collocations
api_list.description: Looks up a word in a spanish collocation database with the top spanish collocations and returns the best spanish collocations (ordered by significance) and 2 or 3 example sentences for each collocation.
